entry.summary: Re 目前的产品有两个方面：一个允许集体启动无需信任的共享钱包的协议，以及一个支持购买后进一步协调和利用的平台。在规模上，Lore 是一个由各种形式和规模的社区组成的网络，包括媒体集体、游戏公会和基于共同兴趣和长期目标的全新类型的 web3 集体。https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/04/06/multicoin-leads-4m-strategic-round-for-web3-co-ownership-platform-lore/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=onecryptofeed&utm_campaign=headlines https://multicoin.capital/2023/04/06/multiplayer-mode/

entry.title: DCG 旗下矿池与挖矿服务公司 Foundry 将开始向用户收取其比特币矿池的费用。它自 2019 年推出矿池以来一直免费提供服务。Foundry 的“零费用”定价结构帮助推动...
entry.summary: DCG 旗下矿池与挖矿服务公司 Foundry 将开始向用户收取其比特币矿池的费用。它自 2019 年推出矿池以来一直免费提供服务。Foundry 的“零费用”定价结构帮助推动其成为最大的比特币矿池，网络份额约为 36%，该公司还提供加密质押服务。（彭博社）https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-04-06/dcg-s-bitcoin-mining-firm-foundry-to-stop-offering-free-services?srnd=all&leadSource=uverify%20wall

entry.summary: Robinhood 与美国阿拉巴马州、科罗拉多州、加利福尼亚州等七州的证券监管机构达成和解，将因 2020 年 3 月的平台中断引发调查支付 1020 万美元的罚款。DFPI 专员表示，像Robinhood这样的平台必须遵守法律要求的对投资者和消费者的常识性保护。（TheBlock） https://www.theblock.co/post/225327/robinhood-settlement?utm_source=onecryptofeed&utm_medium=social

If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m. https://twitter.com/balajis/status/1636797265317867520
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation.
